name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shopify App Detector by Shopify Spy

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uncover the Apps Behind Any Shopify Store. Completely Free Shopify App Detector.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopify App Detector is a free browser extension that identifies apps used on Shopify stores. Gain insights into app usage and discover tools to improve your own store.  

Features:  
- Detects apps on any Shopify-powered store.  
- Displays app names, categories, and descriptions.  
- Provides links to the app store for easy exploration.  
- Simple to use: Just visit a Shopify store, and the extension does the rest.  

Install Shopify App Detector today and uncover the secrets behind successful Shopify stores!
